title: Query
description: A JSON format to support searching for collections in the CMR.

QueryCondition.description: Condition used to filter collection search results from the CMR. If multiple properties are provided in a single condition they will be implicitly AND'ed.

and.description: Groups together conditions to return the intersection of the results.

or.description: Groups together conditions to return the union of the results.

updated_since.description: Revisions with revision date later than provided value

oneOf.description: Concept ID searches are always case sensitive

platform.description: Search against any of the subfields in the platform hierarchy

series_entity.description: Second level classification under category. These keywords usually (but not always) refer to a series of Earth or space observing satellites.

short_name.description: Abbreviated name of the platform (source) used to acquire the data.

long_name.description: Full name of the platform (source) used to acquire the data.

uuid.description: Unique identifier for the platform within the GCMD Keyword Management System.

any.description: Search against any of the platform subfields (category, series_entity, etc.) for the provided value.

instrument.description: Search against any of the subfields in the instrument hierarchy

short_name.description: Abbreviated name of the instrument used to acquire the data.

long_name.description: Full name of the instrument used to acquire the data.

uuid.description: Unique identifier for the instrument within the GCMD Keyword Management System.

any.description: Search against any of the instrument subfields (category, class, etc.) for the provided value.

archive_center.description: Search against any of the subfields in the archive center hierarchy

level_0.description: Top level classification of archive centers.

short_name.description: Abbreviated name of the archive center.

long_name.description: The full name of the archive center.

url.description: The Uniform Resource Locator (URL) of the archive center.

uuid.description: Unique identifier for the instrument within the GCMD Keyword Management System.

any.description: Search against any of the archive center subfields (level0, url, etc.) for the provided value.

two_d_coordinate_system_name.description: UMM two dimensional coordinate system name

keyword.description: Used for free text search across most search fields. Refer to the section 'Find collections by keyword search' on https://cmr.earthdata.nasa.gov/search/site/search_api_docs.html for a list of all fields searched against. Searches are always case insensitive and treat '?' and '*' as wild-cards.

uuid.description: Unique identifier for the science keyword within the GCMD Keyword Management System.

any.description: Search against any of the science keyword subfields (category, term, etc.) for the provided value.

recurring_start_day.description: An integer representing the day to get collections with a temporal extent over a recurring annual period starting on or after the given day.

recurring_end_day.description: An integer representing the day to get collections with a temporal extent over a recurring annual period ending on or before the given day.

exclude_boundary.description: If set to true, the search will not include the boundary date times. It has no impact on periodic temporal searches. Defaults to false.

attribute.description: Specifies a search against additional attributes.

name.description: The name of the additional attribute.

group.description: The group associated with the additional attribute.

type.description: The data type of the attribute being searched against. Support types are string, time, date, datetime, boolean, time-string, date-string, datetime-string, int, and float.

value.description: Search for an exact value match for an additional attribute.

min_value.description: Search for values for an additional attribute which are greater than the provided value.

max_value.description: Search for values for an additional attribute which are less than the provided value.

exclude_boundary.description: If set to true, the search will not include the boundary values for min and max values. Defaults to false.

StringCondition.description: String searches can take either a string or an object with a value to search for and options to apply for the search.

oneOf.description: Used to specify the value and options to apply when searching against a particular field. 'value' is required.

value.description: The value to search for the given field.

oneOf.description: Must contain 4 numbers in the following order: west, south, east, north. West and east represent longitudes (-180 to 180), south and north represent latitudes (-90 to 90).

IgnoreCaseOption.description: If set to true, the search will be case insensitive and if set to false, the search will be case sensitive. Defaults to true.

PatternOption.description: If set to true, the search will treat the value provided for the given field as a pattern with wild-cards, in which '*' matches zero or more characters and '?' matches any single character.
